title: OT75: The Comment King
summary:
Key ideas:
- The author has written a serial novel called Unsong and will be holding reading events in various locations. 
- The author will be visiting California and plans to organize meetups, details will be announced later. 
- The author will be presenting an analysis at the American Psychiatric Association meeting. 
- Correction: FIRE is not a politically biased organization, it fights for everyone's rights within academia. 
- There is now an online bulletin board for the rationalist community. 

Key learnings: 
- The author is an active member of various communities and engaged in multiple activities. 

Key questions: 
- None mentioned.
